content.text: So, I just started a small business. It's been doing better than I expected!
That's great news! What kind of business is it?
I sell miscellaneous stuff in local fairs. I make handmade jewelry, sell some used books, and I also have a booth where I sell homemade food.
That's really cool! I love going to local fairs. They're always so much fun.
Me too! I love seeing all the different things people are selling.
I'm glad your business is doing well. It sounds like you're really enjoying it.
I am! It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I've always wanted to start my own business, but I'm not sure what I would do.
Well, if you ever decide to start something, I'd be happy to help you out.
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to cook, read, and go for walks.
Me too! I love cooking, especially when I can use fresh ingredients.
Me too! I love going to the farmer's market on the weekends.
I've never been to a farmer's market. I should check it out sometime.
You definitely should! It's a great place to find fresh produce and other local goods.
Okay, I will! Thanks for the tip.
